connect.title: Step 1: Connect to Boks Device
connect.desc: Please ensure your Boks device is powered on and in range.

door.title: Step 2: Door Opening & Battery Status
door.desc: Test the opening mechanism and check the battery level.

battery.wait: Please open the door to trigger diagnostics.

questions.title: Step 3: Contextual Questions
questions.desc: This information helps us refine the diagnostics.
questions.has_scale: Does your Boks have an integrated scale?
questions.anything_special: Do you think your Boks has something special (behavior, physical ports...)?

advanced.title: Step 4: Advanced Debugging
advanced.warning: This section allows for in-depth data collection.
advanced.tutorial_desc: For a deeper analysis, use nRF Connect for Mobile.
advanced.explorer_desc: If you know specific UUIDs, enter them here.

recap.title: Step 5: Summary & Contribution
recap.desc: Here is the collected data. Share it if you see anomalies!
recap.interesting_found: Unusual elements detected. Your data is valuable!

finished.title: Finished
finished.desc: You have completed the debug wizard.
